en: The ADiSU Umbria regional scholarship supports students with limited financial means, offering cash grants, free dormitories, and subsidized meals.
ğŸ“Œ Eligibility for 2025/2026:
- Enrollment at a university in Umbria (e.g., University of Perugia).
- ISEE below â‚¬27,948.60 and ISPE below â‚¬60,757.87 (see ISEE section).
- Minimum academic credits (CFU): 20 for first year, 40 for second year, 80 for third year (by October 31, 2025).
- Officially translated and certified financial documents (by Italian embassy in Iran).
- Legal residence in Italy (study visa or Permesso di Soggiorno).
ğŸ“‘ Required Documents:
- Copy of passport and study visa or residence permit (Permesso).
- Codice Fiscale (Italian tax code).
- University enrollment certificate (Immatricolazione).
- Financial documents (officially translated):
- Family income statement for 2023 (translated and certified).
- Property deed or rental contract (for ISEE calculation).
- Bank account balance certificate (certified by embassy).
- Scholarship application form (download from ADiSU website: https://www.adisu.umbria.it).
- Academic transcript (for second-year students and above).
ğŸ’° Scholarship Benefits:
- Cash grant: Up to â‚¬5,192 (based on ISEE).
- Free dormitory or rent subsidy (worth â‚¬2,000-3,000/year).
- Subsidized meals at university cafeterias (â‚¬1-3 per meal).
ğŸ”„ Changes from 2024/2025 to 2025/2026:
- ISEE threshold increased from â‚¬26,306.25 to â‚¬27,948.60.
- ISPE threshold increased from â‚¬57,000 to â‚¬60,757.87.
- Minimum CFU for second year raised from 36 to 40 credits.
- Online document submission now available via ADiSU portal (no in-person requirement).
- Application deadline extended from August 31 to September 15, 2025.
âš ï¸ Legal Notes and Warnings:
- Documents must be officially translated to Italian and certified by the Italian embassy.
- Submitting false documents leads to permanent scholarship disqualification and legal penalties.
- Scholarship recipients must reside in Umbria for the academic year.
ğŸ“Œ FAQs:
- Are masterâ€™s students eligible? Yes, if they meet ISEE and CFU requirements.
- What if my ISEE is above the threshold? You may still qualify for subsidized meals or paid dormitories.
- Where to submit documents? Via ADiSU portal or in person at ADiSU office: Via Benedetta, 14, 06123 Perugia.
ğŸ’¡ Tips:
- Prepare documents at least 2 months before the deadline.
- Contact ADiSU (info@adisu.umbria.it) or ESN Perugia for guidance.
- Use the MyUnipg app to track academic credits: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.unipg.myunipg

en: ISEE (Equivalent Economic Situation Indicator) is a key index used to assess a familyâ€™s economic situation for regional scholarships (e.g., ADiSU Umbria) and student services (dormitories, subsidized meals).
Components of ISEE:
1. ISE (Economic Situation Index): Total annual net income (salaries, freelance income) plus 20% of asset value (properties, bank accounts, cars).
2. Scala di Equivalenza: A parameter adjusting for family size.
Thresholds for 2025/2026:
- ISPE (asset index): â‚¬60,757.87
Simplified formula: ISEE = (Annual income + 20% asset value) Ã· Parameter X
Asset calculation:
- Property value: House square meters Ã— â‚¬500 (zero for renters).
- Other assets (e.g., bank accounts, cars) calculated per INPS rules.
Parameter X based on family size:
- 1 person: 1.00
- 2 people: 1.57
- 3 people: 2.04
- 4 people: 2.46
- 5 people: 2.85
- Each additional person: +0.35
Example: 4-person family, 100mÂ² house, monthly income 2,000,000 IRR, exchange rate 3500 IRR/EUR, bank account â‚¬5,000:
- Property value: 100 Ã— 500 Ã— 20% = â‚¬10,000
- Bank account value: 5,000 Ã— 20% = â‚¬1,000
- Divided by parameter (2.46): 17,857 Ã· 2.46 â‰ˆ â‚¬7,259 (eligible for full scholarship)
Key notes:
- Official ISEE calculation is done by CAF or INPS: http://www.inps.it
- Required documents: Certified translations of 2023 income, property deed or rental contract, bank balance (verified by Italian embassy).
- Some regions (e.g., ER-GO in Bologna) divide scholarships by ISEE ranges:
- Below â‚¬15,333: Full scholarship (â‚¬5,192 + free dormitory)
- â‚¬15,333-â‚¬16,866: Reduced scholarship (â‚¬3,634)
- Above â‚¬27,948.60: Not eligible.
FAQs:
- Property deed or rental contract? Renters typically have lower ISEE and priority for dormitories.
- Currency exchange rate? Use the official 2023 rate from Iranâ€™s Central Bank or embassy-provided rate.
Warning: Submitting false documents leads to scholarship disqualification and legal penalties.

- Red lentils: 200g (available at Minimarket Halal, Via Mario Angeloni, 06124 Perugia).
- Medium onion: 1.
- Small potato: 1 (about 150g).
- Tomato paste: 1 tablespoon (available at Lidl or Conad).
- Spices: Salt (1 tsp), turmeric (1/2 tsp), black pepper (1/4 tsp).
- Olive oil: 2 tablespoons.
- Water: 3 cups (750ml).
ğŸ´ **Instructions**:
1. Finely chop the onion and sautÃ© in a pot with olive oil until golden (5 minutes).
2. Add washed lentils and diced potato.
3. Add tomato paste, spices, and water, then stir.
4. Cover the pot and simmer on low heat for 45 minutes until lentils are soft.
5. Add boiling water if needed to adjust consistency.
ğŸ’¡ **Cooking Tips**:
- For better flavor, use saffron (available at Asia Market, Via dei Priori): Dissolve 1/4 tsp ground saffron in hot water.
- With an electric pot, cooking time reduces to 30 minutes.

en: ğŸ¥ **Public Health Insurance (Servizio Sanitario Nazionale - SSN)**:
- Best for: Students staying over 3 months in Italy (Type D visa or Permesso di Soggiorno).
- Coverage: Free general practitioner visits, free/low-cost hospital services, 50-70% discount on prescription drugs, medical tests with prescription, emergency services.
- Cost: â‚¬149.77/year (2025), paid via F24 form at Poste Italiane or bank.

- Required documents: Passport (original and copy), Codice Fiscale, study visa or Permesso di Soggiorno receipt, university enrollment certificate (from Esse3 portal), proof of address (rental contract or dorm certificate).
- Registration location: ASL Umbria 1, Via della Pallotta, 06126 Perugia (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/ASLPerugia). Hours: Monday-Friday 8:00 AMâ€“1:00 PM, Tuesday/Thursday until 5:00 PM.
- Process: Fill out SSN registration form, submit documents, receive Tessera Sanitaria (health card) in 2-4 weeks.
ğŸ”’ **Private Insurance**:
- Best for: Stays under 3 months or needing specific services (dental, ophthalmology, travel insurance).
- Suggested providers: Allianz (comprehensive medical/travel coverage), AXA (specialized and dental care).
- Cost: â‚¬100-300/year depending on coverage (basic: â‚¬100, premium: â‚¬200-300).
- Coverage: Specialized services (physiotherapy, ophthalmology), dental care, emergency coverage abroad, trip cancellation insurance.
- Required documents: Passport, Perugia address, payment details (credit card or Revolut/Wise).
- Registration: Online via https://www.allianz.it or https://www.axa.it, or in-person at insurance agencies (e.g., Via XX Settembre).
ğŸ’¡ **Advice**: For stays over 6 months, SSN is more cost-effective. Consider private insurance for non-SSN services (e.g., dental).
âš ï¸ **Warning**: Without insurance, medical costs (e.g., hospital stay) can range from â‚¬500-2000 or more.

it: ğŸ¥ **Assicurazione Sanitaria Pubblica (Servizio Sanitario Nazionale - SSN)**:
- Ideale per: Studenti che soggiornano oltre 3 mesi in Italia (visto di tipo D o Permesso di Soggiorno).

en: ğŸ¨ **ADiSU Dormitories**:
- Best for: Students with limited budgets or ADiSU scholarship recipients.

- Application: Via ADiSU portal (https://www.adisu.umbria.it). Deadline: Usually June 30 for Fall 2025 semester.
- Required documents: Codice Fiscale, university enrollment certificate (from Esse3), ISEE form (optional for discounts), passport, study visa.

- Cost: â‚¬200-400/month (shared room), â‚¬500-800/month (single apartment).

en: ğŸ“ **Apartment or Room Rental Steps**:
1. Search listings on Idealista, Immobiliare, or Telegram groups (e.g., t.me/IraniansInPerugia, please confirm link).
2. Contact landlord/agency (phone/WhatsApp) to arrange a viewing.
3. Review the rental contract (Contratto di Locazione). It must be registered with Agenzia delle Entrate (check: https://www.agenziaentrate.gov.it).
4. Pay deposit (1-2 monthsâ€™ rent) via bank transfer (Revolut/Wise) and obtain a receipt.
5. Keep copies of the contract and deposit receipt. Contract should include monthly rent, duration (usually 1 year), termination conditions, and utility details.
âš–ï¸ **Legal Tips**:
- Unregistered contracts are illegal and may cause issues in disputes.
- Avoid verbal agreements; only written contracts are valid.
- For contract reviews, consult CAF (Via della Pallotta, +39 075 500 1234) or a lawyer (â‚¬50-100/hour).
- Deposit must be refunded after lease ends (post-inspection), unless documented damage occurs.
ğŸ’¡ **Advice**: Use Telegram groups (e.g., t.me/ESNPerugia) to find roommates or housing tips.
âš ï¸ **Warning**: Donâ€™t pay a deposit without visiting the property in person and avoid cash payments without a receipt.

it: ğŸ“ **Passaggi per lâ€™Affitto di Appartamenti o Stanze**:

3. Esamina il contratto di locazione. Deve essere registrato presso Agenzia delle Entrate (verifica: https://www.agenziaentrate.gov.it).

5. Conserva copie del contratto e della ricevuta del deposito. Il contratto deve includere affitto mensile, durata (di solito 1 anno), condizioni di recesso e dettagli utenze.
âš–ï¸ **Consigli Legali**:
- I contratti non registrati sono illegali e possono causare problemi in dispute.

- Per revisioni del contratto, consulta CAF (Via della Pallotta, +39 075 500 1234) o un avvocato (â‚¬50-100/ora).

en: ğŸ“‹ **Required Documents**:
- Passport (original and copy of main pages and Type D visa).
- Codice Fiscale (from Agenzia delle Entrate).
- University enrollment certificate (from Esse3 portal).
- Valid health insurance (SSN or embassy-approved private insurance).
- Registered rental contract or dorm certificate (from ADiSU).
- â‚¬40.46 payment receipt (from Poste Italiane).
- 4 passport-sized photos (white background).
- Application form (Kit Giallo) from Poste Italiane.
ğŸ¢ **Application Location**: Questura di Perugia, Via del Tabacchificio, 06133 Perugia (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/QuesturaPerugia). Hours: Monday-Friday 8:30 AMâ€“1:00 PM.
ğŸ“ **Steps**:
1. Within 8 working days of arrival, get Kit Giallo from Poste Italiane (Piazza Matteotti).
2. Fill out the form with accurate details (name, address, visa info).
3. Place documents in Kit Giallo envelope and pay â‚¬40.46 at Poste Italiane.
4. Book a fingerprinting appointment at Questura: https://www.poliziadistato.it (Permesso di Soggiorno section).
5. Visit Questura on appointment day, submit documents, and get fingerprinted.
6. Receive temporary receipt (Ricevuta), valid until Permesso issuance.
7. Receive Permesso di Soggiorno in 1-3 months (by mail or in-person pickup).
ğŸ’¡ **Advice**: Prepare documents a few days in advance and bring extra copies.
âš ï¸ **Warning**: Failing to apply for Permesso within 8 days may lead to fines or deportation.

en: ğŸ“‹ **Required Documents**:
- Passport (original and copy of main page and Type D visa).
- Codice Fiscale application form (download from https://www.agenziaentrate.gov.it).
- Proof of address (registered rental contract or ADiSU dorm certificate).
- Study visa or Permesso di Soggiorno receipt (optional but recommended).

ğŸ¢ **Application Location**: Agenzia delle Entrate, Via Canali, 12, 06124 Perugia (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/AgenziaEntratePerugia). Hours: Monday-Friday 8:30 AMâ€“1:00 PM, Tuesday/Thursday until 4:00 PM.
ğŸ“ **Steps**:
1. Download the application form (Modulo AA4/8) from Agenzia delle Entrate website or obtain it at the office.
2. Fill out the form with personal details (name, date of birth, address).
3. Prepare documents (passport, proof of address, visa/Permesso receipt).
4. Visit Agenzia delle Entrate or book an appointment online: https://www.agenziaentrate.gov.it/prenotazioni.
5. Submit documents; Codice Fiscale is usually issued same day (printed or digital).
ğŸ’¡ **Advice**: Save a copy of your Codice Fiscale on your phone or keep the printed version with you.
âš ï¸ **Warning**: Without a Codice Fiscale, you cannot sign rental contracts, open bank accounts, or register for SSN.

en: ğŸ›ï¸ **Centro Storico, Perugia**:

- **Description**: Historic heart of Perugia with cobblestone streets and medieval architecture. Features Fontana Maggiore (13th-century fountain), Palazzo dei Priori (city hall with historical frescoes), and Cattedrale di San Lorenzo (Gothic cathedral). The Galleria Nazionale dellâ€™Umbria showcases 13th-18th century art.
- **Address**: Piazza IV Novembre, 06123 Perugia (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/CentroStoricoPerugia).
- **Cost**: Free (Galleria Nazionale: â‚¬8, student â‚¬4).
- **Hours**: Galleria Nazionale: 8:30 AMâ€“7:30 PM (closed Mondays). Streets and squares: 24/7.
- **Access**: Minimetro from Pian di Massiano to Piazza Matteotti (ticket: â‚¬1.50).
- **Features**: Cozy cafes (e.g., Sandri on Corso Vannucci), weekly markets, and panoramic views from Arco Etrusco.
ğŸ›ï¸ **Assisi Attractions**:
- **Basilica di San Francesco**: UNESCO World Heritage Site, burial place of St. Francis, with frescoes by Giotto and Cimabue. Includes Upper and Lower Basilicas and St. Francisâ€™ tomb.
- **Address**: Piazza San Francesco, 06081 Assisi (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/BasilicaAssisi).
- **Cost**: Free (guided tours: â‚¬10, audio guide: â‚¬5).
- **Hours**: 8:30 AMâ€“6:45 PM (last entry: 6:00 PM).
- **Rocca Maggiore**: Medieval fortress with panoramic views of Assisi and the Umbrian valley.
- **Address**: Via della Rocca, 06081 Assisi (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/RoccaMaggioreAssisi).
- **Cost**: â‚¬6 (student â‚¬4).
- **Hours**: 10:00 AMâ€“6:00 PM (summer until 8:00 PM).
- **Basilica di Santa Chiara**: Church dedicated to St. Clare, with Gothic architecture and her tomb.
- **Address**: Piazza Santa Chiara, 06081 Assisi (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/SantaChiaraAssisi).
- **Cost**: Free.
- **Piazza del Comune**: Central square with the Temple of Minerva (Tempio di Minerva) and traditional cafes.
- **Address**: Piazza del Comune, 06081 Assisi (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/PiazzaComuneAssisi).
- **Cost**: Free.
- **Features**: Local markets and cultural events.
- **Access to Assisi**: Train from Perugia Fontivegge to Assisi (ticket: â‚¬3, 20 min). Bus from Piazza Partigiani (ticket: â‚¬2.50).
ğŸ›ï¸ **Gubbio and Palazzo dei Consoli**:
- **Description**: Gubbio, a medieval town with stone architecture and Umbrian history. Palazzo dei Consoli houses a museum with ancient artifacts and views over Piazza Grande.
- **Address**: Piazza Grande, 06024 Gubbio (map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/PalazzoConsoliGubbio).
- **Cost**: â‚¬7 (student â‚¬5).
- **Hours**: 10:00 AMâ€“6:00 PM (closed Mondays).
- **Access**: Bus from Perugia Piazza Partigiani (ticket: â‚¬5, 45 min).
ğŸ’¡ **Advice**: Use Esse3 or ISIC card for student discounts at museums. Join ESN group tours (t.me/ESNPerugia) for cheaper visits to Assisi and Gubbio.
